Detailed Description

ZigBee functions.

The ZigBee module is a wireless network for embedded system.

On the robot, The ZigBee module is connected to the UART 1 (this is an optional module !) It can works in 2 modes:

  • Transparent mode, you use the ZigBee has a serial link with the UART 1 functions.
  • API mode, you use the ZigBee GetBufferFromZigbee and SendBufferToZigbee functions.

Zigbee module ok

#define ZIGBEE_TIMEOUT   2

Timeout occurs during operation on Zigbee module

ZIGBEE_MODE_API

ZIGBEE_MODE_TRANSPARENT 

Select Transparent mode for ZigBee module

Function Documentation

UInt8 GetBufferFromZigbee ( UInt8 *  buffer,
UInt32 *  length,
UInt16 *  address 
)

Get a buffer from a ZigBee module.

Use this function only if you have set the ZigBee in API mode. If you have init the module with Transparent mode, please use the UART 1 functions.

Parameters:
buffer Buffer where store the received data (you must declare a buffer of size + bytes minimum).
[out] length Data's length.
[out] address Address of the sender.
Returns:
ZIGBEE_OK if no error, else error code.
Get a zigbee buffer example.
#include <pobRoboticSuite.h>

int main(void)
{
    UInt8 result;
    UInt32 size;
    UInt16 addr;
    UInt8 data[2+16];

    // init cpu and robot:
    InitCpu();
    InitRobot();

    // initialize the uart to usb at 115200 baudrate:
    InitUART0(115200);

    // initialize the zigbee module in API mode with address 1:
    InitZigbee(115200,ZIGBEE_MODE_API,1);

    while(1)
    {
        result = GetBufferFromZigbee(data,&size,&addr);

        if(result==ZIGBEE_OK)
        {
            DebugPrintf("Receiver Address: 0x%x Length: %d\r\n", addr, size);
        }

    }

    return 0;
}
UInt8 InitZigbee ( UInt32  baudrate,
ZigbeeMode  mode,
UInt16  address 
)

Init the ZigBee module.

Parameters:
baudrate ZigBee baudrate (supported baudrate: 9600, 19200, 38400, 57600 and 115200).
mode Select the ZigBee mode: API or Transparent.
address Address of your ZigBee module.
Returns:
ZIGBEE_OK if no error, else error code.
UInt8 SendBufferToZigbee ( UInt8 *  buffer,
UInt32  length,
UInt32  address,
ZigbeeAddress  addressType 
)

Send a buffer to a ZigBee module.

Parameters:
buffer Buffer to send.
length Buffer's length.
address Address of the ZigBee receiver.
addressType Type of address: ZIGBEE_LARGE_ADDRESS or ZIGBEE_SHORT_ADDRESS.
Returns:
ZIGBEE_OK if no error, else error code.
UInt8 SetZigbeeAddress ( UInt16  address  ) 

Set the ZigBee address.

Parameters:
address The new address of your module.
Returns:
ZIGBEE_OK if no error, else error code.
